column1: '''''Mythprint''''' '''(Vol.11, No.1)''' is an issue of the bulletin ''[[Mythprint]]''.

The issue reprints "J.R.R. Tolkien - The Wizard Father" by Michael Tolkien from ''The Sunday Telegraph''. The article includes an extract from a letter to Michael, probably dating from the late 1960s, remarking that he was one of the few people that really knew what ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' was about (pp. 3-4).<ref>{{webcite
